website_summaries.verdict: The tiny AAXA HD Pico Projector has a respectable resolution and good image quality, yet its low brightness and bare-bones features make it best for light-duty use.
pros: Good video and data image quality

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases ever!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible purchase for $150! Tiny, portable, and quality native 720p HD picture. Decent enough in dim light, but great in dark. It runs continuous using a 2.4a USB charger. You can also order a charger from the aaxa website. Be sure to download the most recent firmware from their site for picture improvements not implemented in the stock firmware. You'll need a mini hdmi to hdmi adapter. I also recommend buying an HDMI switch to hook up multiple devices for easy switching. I have mine mounted in my bedroom and couldn't be happier with it. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Marx

customer_reviews.title: seriously .  incredible .
customer_reviews.text: have owned plenty of these . and want one that can run full time usb since off grid and this is it simply perfect . dont hesitate . tripod included . thanks one note if hdmi . make sure you get a cable or adapter to mini hdmi . $5 on amazon . use off usb and tf card so works great and all compact used a 110v version last year and gave to a church in belize this will solve my off grid promoting more 12v or usb and run all night thanks . aaxa
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrible support.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It is unfortunate that you cannot count on this company. The clip inside of the power adapter hole in the projector fell into the machine. Rather than try to open the device and void my warranty, I sent it back to them company and asked them to fix it. They didn’t fix the device nor return my projector. I will be reporting this to Amazon. UPDATE TO REVIEW: After this review, the company returned my device (without repairing it). At least I got it back. I will have it repaired myself. It requires only a simple weld to the loose clip.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality, but not so good ergonomics which could probably be solved by releasing a good FIRMWARE
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the image quality and low noise, good form factor, but SOME CONS: - just a physical and not easy physical switch to switch-on the projector, - there is no way to switch-on the Projector through its remote, nor through the HDMI signal... - there is no stand-by mode, nor automatic, nor manual... just the choice to switch-off the projector - when plugged and charged, there is a blue light which is always-on and can be annoying, and no way to de-activate it, even if switch-off - an update of the FIRMWARE should probably be done in order to solve all those ergonomics problems listed above...
customer_reviews.author: Pascal

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 times. First 2 the remote didn't work. The 3rd one the light flickers. The price changed each time I bought one and I was told the difference would be made up, but now apparently they can't do that. The picture itself wasn't too bad and I wanted to like it. I don't recommend, maybe someone else will have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Zatch

customer_reviews.title: Functional but battery and lens are low quality
customer_reviews.text: Convenient size and easy to get working but the focus drifts and is not consistent across the picture. Probably because the lens is plastic and there is a lot of slop in the focus mechanism. Also, it is max 720 resolution and occasionally the power button does not reapond so to turn it off I have to let the battery die. Of course that happens instantly now that the battery lost all ability to hold charge. I use a usb power supply.
customer_reviews.author: OEJPSP

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: You'll need a different power adapter, possibly. Our projector was touchy and kept randomly shutting off until we figured out that it was the power adapter. Love the size, the adjustability and that it works well with our amazon firestick. The resolution's great, too!
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Well worth $125 on Prime Day
customer_reviews.text: If you're expecting a high end projector, forget it. If you want a small portable projector that plays just about any format and looks really good, this is it. Not the brightest, but I took it camping this past week and it was ideal to project cartoons on the tent wall for the kids. I will also be using this at trade shows to showcase my company logo on a translucent sheet of plexi (part of my business setup).
customer_reviews.author: 5MIN2GG

customer_reviews.title: Not durable - update - great projector and great service no WMV support
customer_reviews.text: I received this with a bad remote - the remote would drain the battery in 48 hours. Since there is no way to use the projector without the remote, it is critical to have. I send an email to customer support and they send me a new remote right away. Works great and their service is great too. Follow up 21 months later. Out of warranty and USB port broken. Unable to charge. $30 to fix. See photo of broken port. Not worth fixing for $30 for another 21 months. Didn’t notice that it can’t play WMV files. Only MPG, MOV. I can’t recommend due to lack of durability given the price.
customer_reviews.author: E. Berin

customer_reviews.title: Small projector, big entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: This small cube projector blew me away with all the connection options it had along with its native 720P HD resolution. I hadn’t seen this on any other tiny projector so that’s what really caught my attention. Upon receiving it, I tested it out right away with my USB which had a movie and some pictures on it and I was NOT disappointed. Everything shows up great and the battery life makes it possible to watch an entire movie with one charge. I’m so excited for the entertainment to come from this tiny device and I can’t thank AAXA enough for creating this awesome little gadget!
customer_reviews.author: Minh Dang

customer_reviews.title: Good image possibly just a bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: To start with mine showed up open, bought it as a new item. Moving past the open box issue it has a good image quality when the fan is not on high the image gets wavy whenever the fan kicks in (background of attached image should be all blue, green area is wavynes affects all colors). The next issue I have with it is the battery is dead whenever I want to use it it will not hold a charge. I really wanted like this little projector but too many little issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Great little portable projector
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for such a small device. It definitely can be used in a partially lit room with no problem. At night I was able to project a massive screen. I had purchased this projector and a different small sized projector both claiming similar configurations. This one put that other projector to shame.
customer_reviews.author: unwillingful

customer_reviews.title: Wow well worth the money for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Was I expecting much, no but what I got was amazing. Nice big image decent in low light to no light. Brighter than expected and perfect for backyard movie night with a external speaker attached. Did get it to read a 32gb memory stick(USB 2.0) which is twice as much as stated by aaxa. This is my second attempt at using an aaxa product and this one has been amazing. The first one I tried was the st200 and that didn't work out so well. Almost regret not getting the newer model with android built in and twice the brightness. For now this will be perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: D Not

customer_reviews.title: I don't think 720p to be the real native resolution
customer_reviews.text: I made some tests with synthetic stationary images having on and off vertical columns (basically 01010101 and 10101010...) displayed at native resolution and color and luminosity changed drastically from one to another. This doesn't happen at native resolution with any other projector I have tested. I contacted with AXXA support, they were able to replicate my reported behavior but they never provide an official answer (much less a solution). I'm guessing the device is actually 320p using temporal dithering (or something similar) to fake the 720p resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Moises Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Nice projector for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is very durable. Battery life is great, I was able to watch a 2 hour movie at normal brightness strictly on battery power. Picture quality is clear, bright, and crisp up to 55" or so, any further degrades the quality and brightness. A dark room is highly recommended, however it will work in dim lightning. The remote works as expected. My only complaint, like others, is the micro USB port. All charging cables I have tried (except the included) will fall out of the device easily. I recommend either using the included cable, or use another cable and hope nothing above a magnitude .01 earthquake occurs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Great novelty movie night projector
customer_reviews.text: It works great as a family movie night projector and even works well against a light coffee painted wall. Would not work in day light. I use an Amazon fire. Took off a star because by the time you get used to the interface, figure out the tiny remote, add a HDMI adapter, add a better charger and add a plug in speaker, it is more than plug and play. With such a low cost, it is very worth it for my once a month movie night.
customer_reviews.author: MD Resident

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Was able to get it hooked up to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for portable home use and occasional work presentations. So far so good. Was able to get it hooked up to av and usb. I have not tried the sd card or hdmi yet. Picture is good in the dark and ok with some light. For the price, it's a good deal. Sound is what I expected for the price - ok for basic use but would hook up an external speaker for movies. Remember to get the user manual from the aaxa website (and read it) - it was helpful. I will update my review if I run into issues.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel N.

customer_reviews.title: really nice one. Feels very bright in a dark room
customer_reviews.text: Compact, high-resolution projector, really nice one. Feels very bright in a dark room. The focus wheel has backlash, it is not convenient. The out of the box firmware is pretty old and obsolete, be sure to update to new one. With old firmware resolution and picture quality feel like very low.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: great picture quality from a small package
customer_reviews.text: The built-in speaker buzzes at higher volume levels , so I output the audio through my Dolby surround box using the SRS surround setting , which sounds great.Otherwise I have no issues with this product.I would also recommend getting the latest firmware update for this projector.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Timing is everything!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pico projector!!!! I do however hate that I have to buy another one inorder to get the blutooth and wifi functionality! But I will! Damnit.. I love lying in bed watching movies on the ceiling....lol!
customer_reviews.author: derek lott

customer_reviews.title: Portability and good image quality, but with very poor power stability
customer_reviews.text: Very much portable and image quality good as expected. Drawbacks are the multiple connections with small devices and cables required when playing files from external drive for HD quality movies having to use extra mini-HD cable, then the speaker, and the AC power, which is the biggest pain and needs to be connected to an AC outlet all the time using a high AMP adapter because the 150-minute continuous play from a full charge battery does not do it.
customer_reviews.author: NhengAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Projector is showing negative film
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product while I was in USA as a gift. I did not open product when it arrived and when I gifted it to dear one. We were having a good experience for first 2 minutes, but then suddenly it started showing everything in negative films. I was so embarrassed in-front of everyone as we had planned movie gathering with 10+ friends. I want to return or want to get it fixed, but there is no customer support available with it. Guys beware as there is no option for after sales service. As you can see in the images comparison between negative image from projector and original image from laptop
customer_reviews.author: nakamura

customer_reviews.title: Great Mimi projector.
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I didn’t listen to the negative reviews. I almost didn’t by this product. I love it. The screen is clear from at least 60 feet. It works good with my computer. So far no complaints, but I only been using it for 1 week. Oh and it seem to be good tech support.
customer_reviews.author: T lewis

customer_reviews.title: The picture was clear and great. However
customer_reviews.text: Having major issues with this. I got it to play one movie stored on one USB device. The picture was clear and great. However, it is NOT working with the SD card or with my other USB device. I figured it may be because it is a very large SD card so I am going to give it a full charge and hope that it works, otherwise I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Tricia Arnts

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is fine, but its very annoying
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is fine, but its very annoying, even crucial, that you cannot charge it and use it at The same time. And The battery life is not as promised, at least when you go through The files on your usb stick. Also going through photos is clumsy and The UI for some reason skips files. Sometimes finding them sometimes not. So it's an annoying thing to use, but as said, for The size and price of it, The picture quality is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picture and decent brightness. Finding some issues with battery and durability.
customer_reviews.text: We bet on this item for a major project coming up and it might be falling short. Huge project coming up next weekend and I'm hoping it's up to the task with battery life as this was advertised. FULL review will be up after next weekend(9/3-9/7).
customer_reviews.author: Casual Weekend Plan

customer_reviews.title: I am still working with this product, but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I am still working with this product, but it seems to work okay for the price. The interface seems to leave something to be desired though, and I wish it had a full size HDMI connection. I ran it for 5 hours straight and it did not overheat, so that is a win. Will give it 4 stars for now.
customer_reviews.author: Nick U.

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: It is not so bright, and being 720p I thought it would have better reading when plugged to the pc, for some special use it would be useful, like using it as a portable display, but for movies I would go for a medium size projector, those selling for 80 bucks
customer_reviews.author: JOSE EMANUEL GAZZANO SENDRA

customer_reviews.title: Small, bright,minihdmi
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Bright picture and small. It doesn't need to be plugged I during use,which is why I picked this model. The mini hdmi is a bit annoying, but the adapter was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: High quality portable for cheap
customer_reviews.text: High quality portable picture for super cheap. Only complaint is the minihd input since all my outputs are full size.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Quinn

customer_reviews.title: ... than stated and the recipient of it was very pleased with the gift
customer_reviews.text: It arrived a bit earlier than stated and the recipient of it was very pleased with the gift. She will be using it to decorate cookies and cakes. Delicious. Stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Christ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish the focus mechanism could make finer adjustments - I'm forever overshooting the sweet spot because it's jerky.
customer_reviews.author: bluskies

customer_reviews.title: The picture is much better than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The picture is much better than I was expecting. The sound is a little tinny but I can't complain for the price. It does connect to a Bluetooth speaker and I can plug a Chromecast into it with an adapter. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Very cool device with tons of connectivity options and it's easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool device with tons of connectivity options and it's easy to set up! It's a good product for the price. I've already connected it to my laptop to project a movie and the picture was crisp and clear! As long as you're in a room with little light, you will get a bright picture as well. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Binh D.

customer_reviews.title: Ok luminance for small dark spaces. Grisp image, ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok luminance for small dark spaces. Grisp image, small portable, durable. Does not last a movie on a battery. Fussy with charging and brightness modes. The battery doesn't last very long and once it drops bit will not play long even when charging.
customer_reviews.author: angel atanassov

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the money just bring your laptop
customer_reviews.text: works fine if plugged in to laptop , not so good with USB drive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The thing is small but packs a great sharp picture and is great for movie nights in ...
customer_reviews.text: The thing is small but packs a great sharp picture and is great for movie nights in the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Alex L. Pangan

customer_reviews.title: I tried using this in a basement with no windows ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this in a basement with no windows and the lights off, still not usable. The resolution is impressive, light source is really really not.
customer_reviews.author: S. Turpin

customer_reviews.title: Shot battery and hot
customer_reviews.text: It only last about an hour. You cannot watch a full movie with it. And it gets extremely hot
customer_reviews.author: LIU JUNYONG

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good display, reds are a lithe saturated but can probably be adjusted; you get what you pay for and this is a good deal and perfect for being too lazy to mount Tvs everywhere outside of the movie room.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua T Jardine

customer_reviews.title: Charging port broken on two so far.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought, returned and now the new one is broken again. The metal ring around the charging hole in back keeps falling inside the projector.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Ger Smarter
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty frustrating. It won't detect any USB device or microSD card more than 4 GB in size. I have to carry multiple to have any selection available.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerfull
customer_reviews.text: Even though its small, it really delivers a high quality picture. I use it both for fun and work and provides a great image without taking too much space
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ayestas

customer_reviews.title: The things I've gotten from Amazon have been so reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks so much for such a great product. I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Ward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light could be a little brighter. But for the price it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little LED projector
customer_reviews.text: Great LED projector, good picture quality. Tripod a little flimsy and thread has come loose already. Still very happy at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hunkin

customer_reviews.title: This projector is hella amazing I really suggest you buy it
customer_reviews.text: This projector is hella amazing I really suggest you buy it. Clear picture highly recommend this projector Iam very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio g.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, excellent quality for such an affordable device
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, excellent quality for such an affordable device. Great for taking slides / home movies to share, and excellent for kids movie nights.
customer_reviews.author: McNoodle

customer_reviews.title: Keeps shutting off, cannot switch on via the remote
customer_reviews.text: This projector seems like a very good idea, 'theoretically' only. The screen size and brightness are decent and it can connect to my laptop by an hdmi cable easily. However, it keeps shutting off every 30min even when fully charged and doesn't start back till at least another 30min. The remote works OK, however you cannot switch ON the projector via the remote (only switch OFF). This is thoroughly inconvenient especially when the projector is placed in an inconvenient location.
customer_reviews.author: Sanky

customer_reviews.title: ... was not fully convinced before buying this for the bad reviews but after more than one month using it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was not fully convinced before buying this for the bad reviews but after more than one month using it I can say it exceeded my expectations. Works perfectly and continuously using a 2.1V adaptor I had from my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Linaldi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this projector, has lost the remote already and will be ordering soon
customer_reviews.author: jeffery b reid

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very good mini projector and is very small and hand. I like it’s clarity
customer_reviews.author: srinath

customer_reviews.title: Shorter Battery Life than advertised
customer_reviews.text: battery life is no 150 mins. just around 90 or so minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service - broken device
customer_reviews.text: My AAXA HD Pico LED Projector Cube was missing the user manual. In case yours does too, here's a link to the online manual/user guide: [...] I contacted customer service (info@aaxatech.com) and they promptly provided the link. Unfortunately, it turns out that my unit came defective. The focus wheel did not work, which resulted in a very blurry projection, and so I had to return it. Customer service was very helpful and offered both exchange of the unit or refund. PROS: Outward appearance - projector looked sturdy; Customer service was very responsive and helpful CONS: Broken focus wheel There is a good chance that I would give 5 stars for a functioning device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not include a Mini-HDMI cable which is needed in order to actually use this projector
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would’ve included a Mini-HDMI cable as that’s what you need in order to connect a computer to this projector.... Without that cord, the projector is useless. And I do not actually have a mini-HDMI cable, so I had to buy an HDMI to Mini-HDMI adapter in order to finally use it.
customer_reviews.author: RHoop206

customer_reviews.title: Camera does not operate on battery power keeps shutting down
customer_reviews.text: I have other pico projectors, this one is crap. Cannot operate on battery power keeps shutting down. I hope I can send it back. Been shopping with Amazon for years
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Host

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for portable entertainment!!!
customer_reviews.text: SO happy with my purchase. Very easy to use and connect – you might need some additional cords to connect to things like your laptop or Apple products – but for the price, it’s very much worth it! The results you get from it are amazing and the battery lasts for a very long time! I will definitely be using this to entertain during the holidays and I’m so excited to show it off!
customer_reviews.author: vtas

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Does what it said it would . I decided on this one because of the reviews bragging up their customer service , They were right .I had problems and they stuck with me until every thing was fine , Next to Amazon customer service , these guys were a REALLY close second !! Andrew was great ..I would recommend this product ,and this company ..
customer_reviews.author: james s parry

customer_reviews.title: Screen flickers all sorts of colors
customer_reviews.text: Screen flickers random colorsaround the screen it projets and if i was epileptic i could be dead right now seriously this is not ok
customer_reviews.author: michael koznecki

customer_reviews.title: I'd give it a half star if I could. ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it a half star if I could. The thing kept freezing up and wouldn't make it 5 minutes into any movie. My husband is very tech savvy and even he couldn't get it to work. Awful awful product.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this bullssss
customer_reviews.text: Ive already had to replace the one I had gotten maybe a few months ago, and now the new one I received flashes while its projecting whatever I'm watching. I won't bother buying another Update: I've replace yet another one of these projectors. The HDMI slot gives out over time. I don't be buying any more
customer_reviews.author: Issac Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it's a pretty great pico projector just make sure you have the right power cable
customer_reviews.author: raymond johnson

customer_reviews.title: Ok for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price. Reviews indicated the device cannot run constantly while plugged in. Unfortunately I can confirm this. For a little more I purchased a device that was brighter and had Android built-in.
customer_reviews.author: AfterForeve12

customer_reviews.title: The pic quality was very poor very poor coloring very poor contrast also it would ...
customer_reviews.text: The pic quality was very poor very poor coloring very poor contrast also it would not go into high power mode even when buying their adapter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Of course they don’t recommend having it show on ceiling while using hdmi where ...
customer_reviews.text: Of course they don’t recommend having it show on ceiling while using hdmi where you will have lights off anyway. Probably only on their more expensive models or ones with less resolution will they place the ports correctly. Also, remote won’t turn on unit you must hold button on device with basically a paper clip end for a good 10 to 20 seconds to start it. A simple power button would be nice and a logical location for where and when the device can be aimed with ports would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: CandiedPage3

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small projector to use in model photography, to project a pattern onto a model's body and not be dependent on cables, hence, the battery operated product. This item fits the bill and I was aware and OK with the low amount of light output, but the execution lacks quality. I had to return the item because the focus wheel didn't work consistently. I believe that is a general quality issue, not a single broken item. Also note that, if you are looking for anything that can handle a presentation, this will only work if you are sitting very close to the projected image. The claimed projection size is exaggerated with respect to readability.
customer_reviews.author: Jurgen LobertTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a piece of cheap Chinese junk and doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A Fanger Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic Color Output with tinted blue
customer_reviews.text: *** PACKED TO RETURN IN 30 MINS *** 1. Keystone correction feature doesn't work, But remote has button for the function. 2. IR remote / receiver not sensitive and pretty hard to find the keys at dark. 3. Blue Tint - Unable to correct with custom RGB values. 4. Doesnt play H.264 mp4 video files. 5. Image soft at edges. 6. Noisy fan. 7. Focus scroll wheel - need to be scrolled all the way down just for minor correction. After research ordered DriodBox Go which is 50 bucks extra.
customer_reviews.author: Baskar Jayakumar

customer_reviews.title: there are better ones available
customer_reviews.text: absolute trash, you cant get it to hook up, I received no instructions on it and even went to the website, no instructions on this product. save your money, there are better ones available.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I was in love with this projector
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was in love with this projector. However, I have had quite a few problems with it. The remote, which is needed to control the projector, had to be replaced within a few months. The battery tested fine, but it still wouldn't work, even with a new battery. It has developed a tendency to turn itself off, and I have had trouble interfacing it with the computer in a reliable way. When it is working, however, it worked very well. I got an excellent picture quality, and it had a great range of options for the projection.
customer_reviews.author: circa24

product_meta.title: AAXA HD Pico Mini LED Projector with 150-Minute Rechargeable Battery, 1280x720p HD Native Resolution, Portable Cube Design, Onboard Media Player, iPhone iPad PS4 Xbox Compatible
product_meta.description: The HD Pico is the world's tiniest native resolution 720P LED projector. Measuring just 2. 3" X 2. 3" X 2. 3" And weighing just 6 ounces The heart of this diminutive Pico projector is a high-resolution 1280x720 pixel liquid crystal on Silicon (LCOS) driven optical engine that produces an immersive 80" High-resolution (HD) display in dark areas. The HD Pico is small, handheld size but huge on performance and incorporates a 150 minute lithium Ion battery 20, 000 hour lads, a powerful 1 watt speaker and an onboard media player. Connectivity options include mini-Hdmi, AV and a 3. 5mm headphone jack. The HD Pico is a true anytime anywhere mobile projector. Supported formats: MP3/ WMA/ OGG/ WAV/ AVI/ WMV/ SMV/ BMP/ jpg/ GIF/ TXT use case: cookie tracing, movie viewing, travel, camping, presentation, business or entertainment.
feature_bullets: 720P HD native resolution. 1080P maximum resolution. 20, 000 hr. LEDs with vibrant color technology.
2. 5 hour rechargeable battery. Premium grade lithium-ion battery. Great for outdoor camping theater nights.
Onboard media player. Built-in speaker. Mini HDMI/ USB/ AV/ micros inputs and 3. 5mm AUX out. Play movies directly without a laptop connection.
Tiny 2. 3" Cube design. Weighs only 6 ounces - The HD Pico is pocket size but huge on performance. Your best travel and business trip companion.

Note: This projector is designed to be used in dark areas only. Max projection image size: 80”. Easily charges via the supplied USB cable but a special 5V 2. 5a power adapter is required for continuous operation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars196 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
